title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the DataFlowAnalyzer tool, including the types of software systems it should support (web applications, mobile apps, desktop apps, and possibly serverless functions), the data flow analysis techniques to be used (dynamic analysis, static analysis, hybrid approach, considering incremental analysis to improve performance on large projects), the desired visualization and reporting capabilities (interactive visualizations, customizable dashboards, exportable reports in various formats such as CSV, PDF, and JSON, providing options for real-time updates), integration with existing development tools such as IDEs (supporting popular ones like Visual Studio Code, IntelliJ IDEA, and Eclipse), version control systems (Git, SVN), and continuous integration/continuous deployment tools (Jenkins, Travis CI, CircleCI), and the specific user roles it should cater to (developers, QA engineers, DevOps, possibly data scientists). Also consider any necessary security requirements for handling sensitive data (compliance with GDPR, HIPAA, and other regulations as applicable), scalability concerns for large software systems, the tool's compatibility with various programming languages and frameworks (Java, Python, JavaScript, .NET, Ruby on Rails, Django), and usability considerations (accessibility, localization, performance optimization). The requirements document should also include a section for potential future enhancements. Once the requirements are defined, create user stories and acceptance criteria to guide the development process. After approval of the requirements document, update the rfc_state field to 'APPROVED' and assign the task to the project-manager.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the DataFlowAnalyzer tool, including the main components, their interactions, and the data flow between them.

title: Develop Data Ingestion Module
description: Implement the module responsible for ingesting and parsing the source code of the software systems to be analyzed.

title: Implement Data Flow Analysis Engine
description: Develop the core engine that performs the data flow analysis on the ingested source code, using the chosen analysis techniques.

title: Design Data Visualization and Reporting for DataFlowAnalyzer Tool (Revised)
description: Update the description to better reflect the scope of work: Design an intuitive user interface, effective data visualizations, and comprehensive reporting mechanisms for the DataFlowAnalyzer tool. These features will present the results of AI-based data flow analysis within complex software systems in a clear and actionable manner, enabling developers to understand and optimize data processing and storage more efficiently.

title: Implement Data Visualization and Reporting
description: Develop the user interface and reporting components based on the approved design.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the DataFlowAnalyzer tool.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the DataFlowAnalyzer tool, covering unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit of the DataFlowAnalyzer tool to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, usage instructions, and troubleshooting tips.
